statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE id = 1;
SELECT technician_name, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE id = 2;
SELECT system_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_schedules ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, system_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, system_id, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE system_id = 3 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT system_id, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM maintenance_schedules GROUP BY system_id HAVING total_maintenance > 3 ORDER BY total_maintenance DESC
SELECT DISTINCT technician_name FROM maintenance_schedules ORDER BY technician_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules ORDER BY system_id ASC, maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT system_id, description FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM repair_history WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY repair_date ASC;
SELECT system_id, repair_date, cost FROM repair_history ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT system_id, start_date, end_date, description FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE system_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE system_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_id, start_date, end_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT repair_date, cost FROM repair_history WHERE cost > 200.00;
SELECT repair_id, parts_replaced FROM repair_history ORDER BY repair_date DESC, cost ASC;
SELECT system_id, MAX(repair_date) AS last_repair_date FROM repair_history GROUP BY system_id;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_Schedule;
SELECT system_id, description FROM Maintenance_Schedule WHERE scheduled_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT system_id, repair_date, repair_description FROM Repair_History ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, installation_date FROM Geothermal_System WHERE system_capacity > 500;
SELECT system_name, installation_date, system_capacity FROM Geothermal_System WHERE installation_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY system_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_Schedule ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT system_id, scheduled_date, description FROM Maintenance_Schedule WHERE system_id = 3 AND description LIKE '%maintenance%' ORDER BY scheduled_date ASC;
SELECT system_name, installation_date FROM Geothermal_System WHERE system_capacity > 500 ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT repair_id, system_id, MAX(repair_date) AS last_repair_date FROM Repair_History GROUP BY system_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT system_id, system_name FROM Geothermal_System JOIN Maintenance_Schedule ON Geothermal_System.system_id = Maintenance_Schedule.system_id WHERE scheduled_date >= '2021-01-01' AND scheduled_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules;
SELECT system_id, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT description FROM repair_history WHERE cost > 500;
SELECT * FROM energy_systems ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT system_name, location FROM energy_systems JOIN facility_info ON energy_systems.system_id = facility_info.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC, maintenance_id
SELECT system_id, COUNT(*) as total_repairs FROM repair_history GROUP BY system_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT system_id, repair_date, cost FROM repair_history WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT facility_name, location, contact_person FROM facility_info WHERE location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT system_name, location, capacity FROM energy_systems WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY system_name
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, maintenance_type ASC
SELECT system_id, system_name, location FROM geothermal_system WHERE system_type = 'Geothermal'
SELECT technician_name, contact_number, email FROM technician
SELECT repair_id, repair_date, repair_type FROM repair_history ORDER BY repair_date DESC
SELECT component_name, component_type, component_status FROM component
SELECT * FROM technician ORDER BY technician_name DESC;
SELECT system_name, location FROM geothermal_system WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM maintenance_schedule JOIN technician ON maintenance_schedule.technician_id = technician.technician_id;
SELECT system_name, COUNT(component_id) AS total_components FROM geothermal_system JOIN component ON geothermal_system.system_id = component.system_id GROUP BY system_name;
SELECT * FROM repair_history WHERE repair_type = 'Emergency' ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
